flashcards.english: Singular (We - him/her): Nĩ aroka (coming), Nĩ ararĩra (crying), Nĩ ararĩa (eating), Nĩ arararia (speaking), Nĩ arakena (happy), Nĩ aratheka (laughing), Nĩ arathĩĩ (going), Nĩ arathooma (reading), Nĩ aranđĩka (writing). Plural (O - them): Nĩ maroka (coming), Nĩ mararĩra (crying), Nĩ mararĩa (eating), Nĩ marararia (speaking), Nĩ marakena (happy), Nĩ maratheka (laughing), Nĩ marathĩĩ (going), Nĩ marathooma (reading), Nĩ maranđĩka (writing)
flashcards.notes: Complete 3rd person present progressive conjugation. Subject markers: a- (singular), ma- (plural). Pattern: Nĩ + subject marker + ra- + verb root + ending

flashcards.english: Singular (Wee - you): Nĩ ũroka (coming), Nĩ ũrarĩra (crying), Nĩ ũrarĩa (eating), Nĩ ũrararia (speaking), Nĩ ũrakena (happy), Nĩ ũratheka (laughing), Nĩ ũrathĩĩ (going), Nĩ ũrathooma (reading), Nĩ ũranđĩka (writing). Plural (Inyuĩ - you): Nĩ mũroka (coming), Nĩ mũrarĩra (crying), Nĩ mũrarĩa (eating), Nĩ mũrararia (speaking), Nĩ mũrakena (happy), Nĩ mũratheka (laughing), Nĩ mũrathĩĩ (going), Nĩ mũrathooma (reading), Nĩ mũranđĩka (writing)
flashcards.notes: Complete 2nd person present progressive conjugation. Subject markers: ũ- (singular), mũ- (plural). Pattern: Nĩ + subject marker + ra- + verb root + ending
